name: webtris
description: Web based tetris with extra features.

scripts.build: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && npx babel dist/main.bundle.js --out-file dist/main.bundle.js
scripts.watchProd: nodemon --exec "npm run build" -e js,scss --ignore dist/ --ignore cache/
scripts.buildDev: npx webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js && npx babel dist/main.bundle.js --out-file dist/main.bundle.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "npm run buildDev" -e js,scss --ignore dist/ --ignore cache/
